Declaration

SetupColliderForUIElement()

Create a BoxCollider for the UI element if it doesn't have one yet. This method automates a tedious part of the manual UI setup, but is not the perfect solution for complex element shapes etc. DO NOT USE WITH LAYOUT GROUPS! Greyed-out rect fields count as 0.

Declaration
public virtual void SetupColliderForUIElement()
